title: Charlie Apple Eater: Featuring the Art of Vincent Van Gogh
description: Charlie loves apples and adventures. The best adventures occur just before the sun sets and your toes get too cold. Curious and brave, Charlie builds a shelter in a far-away apple orchard. He adopts the apple orchard as his own and homesteads there.With his faithful friends, McGivney, Bandit, and a little lost wolf cub, Charlie defends his keep against the Mean-Faced Monkeys and other invaders while battling the elements and fighting for survival. Luckily, Charlie has a mother who loves him, and knows when itâ€™s time for him to come inside for the night.
author: Ashton  Smith
